author: Debi F.
text:
As a Seller, I was contacted by a rep that offered to pick up my items the next day instead of having me ship the items.  This was a great idea until no one came to pick up the next day or the day after that.  I emailed the rep., Kira, and told her no one picked up so she scheduled another pick up.  No one picked up again, so I ended up shipping it with UPS.  That was disappointing.

As a buyer, The items I've purchased have been very good but can run a little small overall, so I've had to return some items, which was easy to do.
title: Mixed Reviews

author: customer
text:
Orders strappy sandals and a purse. Purse was perfect. Strappy sandals arrived broken. TRR refunded me for the shoes but my review is negative because of the wasted time searching/waiting for/picking up the shoes from UPS/returning the shoes to UPS, AND ALSO the energy and time I had to put in to fight to get shipping costs refunded (aka, the bare minimum compensation).

Visual description and fit of items were accurate.
title: Got customer support for broken shoes, but had to work for it

author: customer
text: The shoes I received had the correct condition listed and they were actually better that I expected. The shirt I received, however, was listed as “very good” and I would not agree with that. The under armor sign was very worn and the shirt did not smell great when I received it. This was my first time ordering with The Real Real and probably my last. I had higher expectations for the price.
title: Not what I expected…

author: customer
text: The product was exactly as described, a LV bag with minor wear throughout. The shipping on the other hand left a lot to be desired. The bag was in a protective cloth bag and thank god for that because I don’t think there would have been a purse otherwise. The box was too big for the purse and it was torn to shreds with the purse falling out when it arrived. I would think this is not how high end designer product should be treated… especially when you’re paying that much for an item, it should still feel like your buying first hand, just with different wrapping. Solid product but the delivery both literally and figuratively were severely lacking.
title: Delivery
